content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5) and multiple offshore pumps and boilers at various positions, including:
- Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
- Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
- Multiple pipes connecting these entities

### Copper plate mine at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
- Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
- Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
- Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
- Multiple pipes connecting these entities

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been constructed yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are connected by a pipe before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the pipe group is not empty and that the offshore pump and boiler are part of the same fluid system.

### Errors when refueling boiler
- Ensure that there is coal in the inventory before attempting to refuel the boiler.
- Make sure that the boiler is not out of fuel before attempting to refuel it.

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure that the pipe group is not empty before attempting to connect entities.
- Make sure that the entities are part of the same fluid system before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when working with offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the offshore pump is not out of fluid before attempting to use it.

### Errors when working with boilers
- Ensure that the boiler is connected to a pipe before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the boiler is not out of fuel before attempting to use it.
- Ensure that the boiler is part of a fluid system before attempting to use it.
